test.name: csw:discovery.commons.getrecords.2.1
test.assertion: A reference to a coordinate reference system (CRS) shall be a URI value that conforms to a known URI scheme. Provide a URL for definitions that can be accessed from an online source; otherwise provide a URN that SHOULD conform to the syntax described in OGC 06-023.
test.comment: This test issues a GetRecords request using HTTP POST to the CSW server under test. This references the CRS as a URN, and the result is expected as usual (the 1 record in this BBOX)

request.body:
<csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw" version="2.0.1" resultType="results" outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw">
<csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:BBOX> <ogc:PropertyName xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows">csw:Record/ows:BoundingBox</ogc:PropertyName> <gml:Envelope srsName="urn:x-ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.11:4326"> <gml:LowerCorner>36.94 -8.52</gml:LowerCorner> <gml:UpperCorner>69.96 30.19</gml:UpperCorner> </gml:Envelope> </ogc:BBOX> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query>
</csw:GetRecords>
